segments.text: That's great ! We made 20 minutes earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good thing , we took a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , look there . It is an advertisement of the piano training class on the billboard . The place is not far from our home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , come on . What are you thinking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your sister is in high school now ; no one plays the piano at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't tell me you want me to do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? Why not ! The piano is right there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don't like playing the piano . And the homework keeps me busy enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , I will have a look at the piano class after work by myself .
segments.speaker: S2
